resources.string-array:
Be the first to get three in a row! This multiplayer game is played on a 3 by 3 game board. One player is X, the Other O. Players alternate placing their X or O on one of the empry fields. The game ends when one player gets three in a row or when there is no empty field left, in which case the game ends in a tie. Be the first to get three in a row!
